name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle's shell is not just for protection. Its round shape minimizes resistance in water.

name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu stores electricity in its cheeks for zapping an enemy if threatened.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff's vocal cords allow it to sing lullabies that cause its enemies to fall asleep.

name: Meowth
description: Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to silently sneak up on its prey.

name: Psyduck
description: Psyduck uses psychic powers, but it cannot remember doing so, leaving it puzzled.

name: Machop
description: Machop's muscles never tire, no matter how much it exercises.

name: Gengar
description: Gengar hides in shadows. It absorbs the warmth of those around it to create a chill.

name: Eevee
description: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment.

name: Snorlax
description: Snorlax only wakes up to eat and barely moves unless it has consumed 900 pounds of food.

name: Mewtwo
description: Mewtwo was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering.

name: Cyndaquil
description: Cyndaquil stores heat in its back and breathes fire. It is timid but explodes in anger if threatened.

name: Bulbasaur's rival
description: This Pokemon is a grass-type starter known for its fiery tail.

name: Totodile
description: Totodile is energetic and brave. It chomps at anything with its large, pointed jaws.

name: Mudkip
description: Mudkip walks on the seabed using its fins. It can breathe underwater by using its gills.

name: Clefairy
description: Clefairy uses the moonlight to store up energy. On a full moonlit night, it can use Telekinesis.

name: Vulpix
description: Vulpix has six tails and can control fire with great precision. It uses nine tails to create illusions that trap foes.

name: Abra
description: Abra dislikes being looked at. It uses its psychic powers to teleport away when it feels threatened.

name: Ponyta
description: Ponyta is very popular. Its fiery mane is said to bring good luck. Trainers often ride them.

name: Larvitar
description: Larvitar eats a mountain's worth of soil each day. It tunnels through the ground and rarely surfaces.

name: Riolu
description: Riolu trains diligently in harsh mountains. It can sense auras and predict an opponent's moves.

name: Psyduck
description: Psyduck uses psychic powers, but it cannot remember doing so, leaving it puzzled.

name: Machop
description: Machop's muscles never tire, no matter how much it exercises.
